content:
Hi everyone,

Just wanted to invite you to our next RSpace open-source office hour on November 12th. Ãkos Kukucska will present an update on his work on the RSpace:Dataverse adapter - thought this might be of interest to folks here since it's about improving interoperability between the two systems.

The RSpace team will also share some general updates, and we might hear about an RSpace:Dataverse FDO (FAIR Digital Object) concept, though that's still being confirmed.

These office hours are open sessions where we discuss RSpace developments and integrations. If anyone from the Dataverse community is working on related projects or has ideas for RSpace:Dataverse workflows, we'd be happy to hear from you - just let me know.

Sign up here: https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/83141ffc-39a0-49c0-a2d1-489801b7fcfe@b01eeac5-a192-4621-90cb-b956e9ac5e26

Would be great to see some of you there!

Cheers,
Tilo
@Tilo Mathes thanks for the invitation! I reposted it here: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/qVDXbuvm11I/m/pw-aBaHrAQAJ
I added it to the Dataverse Community Calendar as well: https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=c_udn4tonm401kgjjre4jl4ja0cs%40group.calendar.google.com&ctz=America%2FNew_York
@Tilo Mathes great meeting! Can you please share the slides? The general meeting slides you were sharing at the end? You mentioned a demo video that has Dataverse in it. :smile:

Thanks for joining @Philip Durbin ğŸš€ . The meeting notes and the slide deck can be found here: https://github.com/rspace-os/rspace-web/wiki/Community-Events ; The video you're referring to can be directly accessed here: https://youtu.be/XxlrblGxvGY?si=NZHX_yUrZL6iKjfx ; we still need to work on putting the IGSN IDs into the related materials metadata though :smile:
Sure, but the video does a good job of suggesting what's possible.
Thanks for the slides, etc. Great stuff.
Birdaro is interesting. I kicked off a new topic on it: #community > Birdaro
